# `ConditionalGroupActivationCondition` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| simpleMetric | [`ConditionalGroupActivationSimpleMetric`](conditionalgroupactivationsimplemetric-definition.md) | No | Instructs this condition to evaluate a simple queue-level metric |
| operator | `string` | No | The operator used to compare the actual value against the threshold value |
| value | `number` | No | The threshold value, beyond which a rule evaluates as true |
